body_html: I don't understand what these ConvForward and ConvBackward sequences mean. I also don't really know where do you want to accumulate the grads -- these functions only compute and return them, there's no accumulation going on.

body: I don't understand what these ConvForward and ConvBackward sequences mean. I also don't really know where do you want to accumulate the grads -- these functions only compute and return them, there's no accumulation going on.
